function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Application of green design and environmentally friendly approaches at bee’ah headquarters","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modular construction for emergency hospitals may not have effective pathogen control measures in place, leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of touchless technology and automation may lead to overreliance on these systems and neglect of manual cleaning and disinfection processes, resulting in higher transmission rates of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High reliance on contactless systems may lead to a false sense of security and neglect of other important infection control measures, contributing to increased transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased transmission of covid-19 due to inadequate ventilation and airflow in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate construction techniques for emergency buildings , covid hospitals, quarantine tents","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conversion of existing buildings into emergency centers raises potential health and safety risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 virus in crowded places","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective building design for healthy environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in buildings due to poor ventilation and crowded spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on other research topics in healthy building technologies, with emphasis mainly on covid-19 and ventilation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Heavy reliance on buildings for livelihood activities during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation systems in buildings leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable and cost-effective building technologies for improving air quality and reducing disease transmission.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants linked to mental conditions and negative feelings","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of spatial layout consideration impacting indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective promotion of social interactions in building design","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suboptimal levels of ieq variables in buildings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in ensuring high ieq levels during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor airborne transmission of covid-19 in crowded and poorly ventilated environments.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges to traditional design and construction approach to residential and public buildings.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Post covid-19 architecture and the concept of healthy buildings.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for covid-19 detection and prediction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate exploration of ai utilities in healthcare","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential conflicts of interest in research and publication","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of inaccurate or biased ai-generated predictions leading to inappropriate resource allocation and ineffective health management","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited coverage of literature databases may result in incomplete understanding of ai’s impact on health care in lmics","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-reliance on ai predictions may lead to neglect of traditional public health practices and human judgment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using ai algorithms to design new molecules or repurpose drugs may lead to unforeseen side effects or interactions with existing medications.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing vast amounts of treatment data globally using ai tools may raise concerns about data privacy and security.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai for diagnosis and treatment decision-making may lead to misinterpretation of medical data and incorrect clinical decisions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based prediction models for pandemic forecasting","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai for patient management and monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ai-facilitated drug discovery for covid-19 treatment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on ai-algorithms for identification of suspected cases and high-risk groups may lead to misclassification or false negatives.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-driven tools for accurate detection of covid-19 may lead to missed diagnoses and delayed treatment for individuals with other types of respiratory diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on smart city data network and terminal tracking systems may lead to privacy concerns and misuse of personal data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential over-reliance on ai for disease diagnosis and patient positioning, leading to reduced human oversight and interaction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on cross-population train/test-based ai models for virus detection","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilization of deep-learning prediction models for risk stratification in resource-limited settings","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease covid-19 propagation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Literature search may have missed relevant articles due to specific search terms or exclusion criteria.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate data extraction and synthesis leading to incorrect conclusions and recommendations.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Language and communication barriers may lead to exclusion of valuable non-english articles that contain important insights.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on ai-driven tools for clinical, epidemiological, and public health data may lead to errors or biases in decision-making.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of ai in lmics may perpetuate health inequalities and increase the burden on healthcare systems in those countries.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for reliance on ai to overlook contextual and cultural factors in disease control and treatment, leading to suboptimal outcomes in certain communities.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of existing health systems to prevent massive disruption caused by covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate processing and integration of clinical, epidemiological, and genetic data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
